verses.roman:
teṅha dekhāilā more bhakti-yoga-pāra
tāṅra prasāde jāniluṅ 'kṛṣṇa-bhakti-yoga' sāra

synonyms: teṅha—he; dekhāilā—has shown; more—to Me; bhakti-yoga—of devotional service; pāra—the limit; tāṅra prasāde—by his mercy; jāniluṅ—I have understood; kṛṣṇa-bhakti—of devotional service to Lord Kṛṣṇa; yoga—of the yoga system; sāra—the essence.
translation: "Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya has shown Me the limit of devotional service. Only by his mercy have I understood that devotional service to Kṛṣṇa is the essence of all mystic yoga.
